fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Interface IFileChecker


  • public interface IFileChecker
    Interface for custom file checker. File checker is used to check if downloaded file is correct before saving it.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkFile(DownloadTask pTask, List<MemorySlot> pMemorySlots)
      Checks if downloaded file is correct.

    • Method Detail

      • checkFile

        boolean checkFile(DownloadTask pTask,
                List<MemorySlot> pMemorySlots)
        Checks if downloaded file is correct.
        Parameters:
        pTask - DownloadTask that has just been finished.
        pMemorySlots - All downloaded data.
        Returns:
        True if this file is correct. False if it should fail.
